title: Modulated Movement Whoosh Sound Effects
description: The Modulated Movement collection includes more than 500 dynamic, unique, trade craft movement and transition sounds including morphs, whooshes, swishes, transitions, projectile throws, mechanical movement sounds.
longDescription:
Audio Demo

Modulate the motion in your next audio soundscape with Modulated Movement. Modulated Movement is a cohesive and potent collection of the sounds things make when in motion. Be it mechanical, organic, tech, sci-fi, futuristic, articulated or ambient, this collection plays the perfect compliment to characters, machines, objects or any graphic assets that are flying, creeping, crawling, crashing, sliding, swinging, swiping or displaying any kind of transitions or motions in the real world or even closer to home, in the unreal world of your projects.

This collection is a great fit for creative audio settings like; movie trailers, explainer videos, animations, multimedia, game and movie sound design or straightforward video productions. Make your next soundscape a moving experience with audio elements designed for game developers building with Unreal Engine, any game or multimedia development platform.

Designers at every level can employ these high quality audio assets to uniquely describe in sound, the movements your viewers see. Modulated Movement is one of our most popular sound FX collections and in the hands of skillful editors and creators, it's a fully energized power pack for activating movements with energizing sound so you can domin8 your production.
technicalDetails:
• 588 files

  • Designed Motion Sound Library
  • Essential for Animation, Film and Games
  • Synthesized Whooshes, Airy Movements
  • Light, Deep, Heavy Swishes, Fly-bys, Morphs
  • Game Styled Next Page Turns, Slides
  • Weapon or Projectile Pass by Swings, Swooshes
  • Delayed, Sequenced Futuristic Files
  • Dust Particle Transitions
  • Fast, Flutters, Big, Cinematic, Momentum
  • Simple Organic, Moderate, and Processed Complex & More!
